content: 18½ 37 39 43 46 sts to end 14 15 18 18 21 21 sts 18½ 18½ in ending with a ws row cast off in patt next row cast off 4 5 6 6 7 7 sts purl to shape neck and shoulder end 10 10 12 12 14 14 sts for 1st and 2nd size only work 3 row casting off 5 5 6 6 7 7 sts at neckband using b and working in st-st throughout beg of 2nd row 5 5 6 6 7 7 sts join right shoulder seam with rs facing proceed as follows - cast off rem 5 5 6 6 7 7 sts using 5½mm needles and b pick up and next row cast off 4 sts k26 29 turn knit 10 10 12 12 12 12 sts evenly along leave rem 50 55 sts on a stitch holder left sleeve left side of neck knit across 19 21 21 23 27 30 sts using 5½mm needles thumb method and b 23 23 sts left on a stitch holder at front of next row p2tog purl to end 26 29 sts cast on 29 29 31 33 35 35 sts work 6 row neck as follows - k3 1 1 2 2 2 m1 k4 6 in 1x1 rib 6 6 6 6 m1 3 times k4 2 2 3 3 3 pick for all 6 sizes change to 6½mm needles and proceed as up and knit 10 10 12 12 12 12 sts evenly next row cast off 4 5 5 5 6 7 sts knit to follows - along right side of neck and knit across last 2 sts k2tog 21 23 31 33 36 38 sts next row k1 1 2 1 2 2 m1 k2 m1 29 31 31 33 33 33 sts left on a stitch next row p2tog purl to end 13 13 13 15 15 15 times k2 2 3 2 3 3 holder at back of neck as follows - k3 4 4 20 22 30 32 35 37 sts 43 43 45 49 51 51 sts 5 5 5 m1 k4 m1 6 times k2 3 3 4 4 4 starting with a purl row and working in st-st 79 83 87 91 91 91 sts next row cast off 4 5 5 6 6 7 sts knit to throughout increase 1 st at each end of 6th and last 2 sts k2tog 15 16 24 25 28 29 sts starting with 2nd row of 1x1 rib work until every foll 4th row to 61 65 67 69 71 83 sts next row purl neckband measures 6cm 2½in increase 1 st at each end of every foll 6th row to next row cast off 4 5 5 6 6 7 sts knit to cast off in rib 71 73 75 79 81 85 sts last 2 sts k2tog 10 10 18 18 21 21 sts cont without shaping until sleeve measures next row
